source: NJ 211, VA New Jersey Health Care, Community Hope, New Jersey Department of Military and Veterans Services

resources.name: NJ 211
resources.description: 24/7 information and referral service offering services via phone, chat, text and web connecting to housing, food, healthcare, mental health, and legal aid

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: Free, confidential helpline providing mental health support to New Jersey veterans and their families

resources.name: VA New Jersey Health Care System
resources.description: Veterans Affairs system providing comprehensive healthcare, mental health services, and homeless veteran support

resources.name: Community Hope - Hope for Veterans
resources.description: Provides transitional housing, permanent supportive housing, rapid re-housing, and homelessness prevention with wraparound services

resources.name: Foundation for Sustainable Veterans Housing (NJ)
resources.description: Leading initiative to build veteran housing facility in each of New Jersey's 21 counties and end veterans homelessness

resources.name: New Jersey Department of Military and Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing veteran benefits, services, and advocacy

resources.name: New Jersey VFW - Homeless Assistance
resources.description: Provides homeless assistance and veteran support services

resources.name: Veterans Justice Outreach Initiative - NJ Reentry Corporation
resources.description: Provides legal services and court-involved veteran support including training for career employment

resources.name: New Jersey Veterans Veteran Support Alliance
resources.description: Organization supporting and empowering New Jersey veterans through advocacy and resources

resources.name: Veterans Affairs Emergency Housing Hotline
resources.description: 24/7 emergency housing assistance for homeless veterans
